arStrings.szText: {c_gold}Use: {/c}Increase the damage of Hit Effects by {c_yellow}100%{/c} for all nearby players and increases Experience by {c_yellow}5%{/c}. Lasts 20 minutes.
This is a type III incense. Only one Incense of a type may be active at a time. Experience Bonus does not stack with other Incenses.
